forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers and thundershowers this morning, then cloudy and windy with rain likely during the afternoon. High 16C. Winds SSE at 30 to 50 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. 25 to 50mm of rain expected. Winds could occasionally gust over 65 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain likely. Becoming windy in the afternoon. High near 60F. Winds SSE at 20 to 30 mph. Chance of rain 100%. 1 to 2 inches of rain expected. Winds could occasionally gust over 40 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Thundershowers overnight following a period of rain and wind early. Low 8C. SSW winds at 30 to 50 km/h, decreasing to 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Winds could occasionally gust over 65 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain and wind early...then remaining cloudy with thundershowers developing overnight. Low 46F. SSW winds at 20 to 30 mph, decreasing to 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Winds could occasionally gust over 40 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with periods of rain. High 12C. Winds S at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall around 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of rain. High 54F. Winds S at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall near a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A steady rain in the evening. Showers continuing late. Low around 5C. Winds ESE at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers late. Low 42F. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies early will become partly cloudy later in the day. High 11C. Winds NNW at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy early with partial sunshine expected late. High 53F. Winds NNW at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Clear during the evening followed by cloudy skies overnight. Low 4C. Winds NE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Clear skies in the evening then becoming cloudy overnight. Low 39F. Winds NE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers early, becoming a steady rain later in the day. High 11C. Winds SSE at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers in the morning will evolve into a more steady rain in the afternoon. High 53F. Winds SSE at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain likely. Low 8C. Winds SSE at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain. Low 47F. Winds SSE at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Windy with rain likely. High 14C. Winds SSE at 30 to 50 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall may reach 25mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain and wind. High 58F. Winds SSE at 20 to 30 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near an inch.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain. Low near 10C. Winds S at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall may reach 25mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of rain. Low near 50F. Winds S at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall possibly over one inch.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional light rain. High 14C. Winds SSW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 80%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of light rain. High 57F. Winds SSW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 80%.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Periods of rain. Low 7C. Winds SSE at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall near 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of rain. Low 44F. Winds SSE at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall near a half an inch.

forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of light rain. High near 55F. Winds S at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. Low near 45F. Winds SSW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 60%.
